00020 SpinField::SpinField( string fieldLabel, bool fieldRequired, bool fieldReset ) : Field( fieldLabel, fieldRequired, fieldReset)
00021 {
00022   // Set some default values. 
00023   min = NULL;
00024   max = NULL;
00025   step = 1;
00026   dec = 1;
00027   adhereStep = false;
00028   adhereDec = false;
00029 }

00034 
00035 SpinField::SpinField( string fieldLabel, bool fieldRequired, bool fieldReset, double* minimum, 
00036               double* maximum, double stepsize, bool adStep, int decimals, bool adDec ) : Field( fieldLabel, fieldRequired, fieldReset)
00037 {
00038   min = NULL;
00039   max = NULL;
00040   
00041   // The class manages the values of min and max it self even though a pointer is asked. 
00042   // Meaning that new variables are made to which min and max point.
00043   // These are destroyed explicitly in the destructor.
00044   
00045   if( minimum )
00046   {
00047     try
00048     {
00049       min = new double;
00050     }
00051     catch(exception& e)
00052     {
00053       throw;  // rethrow the exception
00054     }
00055     *min = *minimum;
00056   }
00057   
00058   if( maximum )
00059   {
00060     try
00061     {
00062       max = new double;
00063     }
00064     catch(exception& e)
00065     {
00066       throw;  // rethrow the exception
00067     }
00068     *max = *maximum;
00069   }
00070   
00071   step = stepsize;
00072   adhereStep = adStep;
00073   dec = decimals;
00074   adhereDec = adDec;
00075 
00076 };

00082 SpinField::SpinField( vector<string> * description )
00083 {
00084   string str;
00085 
00086   for( int i = 0; i<(int)description->size(); i++)
00087   {
00088     str = description->at(i);
00089 
00090     if( str.compare( 0, 7, "Label: ") == 0 )  // ----------------------------------
00091     {
00092       str.erase(0, 7);
00093       this->setLabel( str );
00094     }
00095     else if( str.compare( 0, 10, "Required: ") == 0 ) //---------------------------
00096     {
00097       // Get the substring of str which should contain true or false.
00098       // Convert it to a boolean, this function can throw a FieldException.
00099       // Assign the boolean to required.
00100       try { this->setRequired( this->stringToBool( str.substr(10, 5) ) ); }
00101       catch(  FieldException& e ) 
00102       {
00103         // Add information to the exception to be able to trace its origin. 
00104         e.setFieldType( this->getType() );
00105         e.setFieldLabel( this->getLabel() );
00106         e.addInfo( "Input string was: " + str + "\n" );
00107         throw;
00108       }   
00109       catch( exception& e) { throw; } 
00110     }
00111     else if( str.compare( 0, 7, "Reset: ") == 0 ) //-------------------------------
00112     {
00113       // The same as above but now not for required but for reset.
00114       try { this->setReset( this->stringToBool( str.substr(7, 5) ) ); }
00115       catch(  FieldException& e ) 
00116       {
00117         // Add information to the exception to be able to trace its origin. 
00118         e.setFieldType( this->getType() );
00119         e.setFieldLabel( this->getLabel() );
00120         e.addInfo( "Input string was: " + str + "\n" );
00121         throw;
00122       }       
00123       catch( exception& e) { throw; } 
00124     }
00125     else if( str.compare( 0, 7, "Minimum" ) == 0 )
00126     {
00127       // TODO
00128     }
00129     else if( str.compare( 0, 7, "Maximum" ) == 0 )
00130     {
00131       // TODO
00132     }   
00133     else if( str.compare( 0, 8, "Stepsize" ) == 0 )
00134     {
00135       // TODO
00136     }
00137     else if( str.compare( 0, 10, "AdhereStep" ) == 0 )
00138     {
00139       // TODO
00140     }     
00141     else if( str.compare( 0, 8, "Decimals" ) == 0 )
00142     {
00143       // TODO
00144     }
00145     else if( str.compare( 0, 9, "AdhereDec" ) == 0 )
00146     {
00147       // TODO
00148     }     
00149     else  //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00150     {
00151       throw FieldException( 1, this->getType(), this->getLabel(), "Input string was: " + str + "\n" ); // throw Error: unknown item in description 
00152     }
00153     
00154     
00155   }
00156 };

00161 
00162 SpinField::~SpinField()
00163 {
00164   if( min != NULL ) delete min;
00165   if( max != NULL ) delete max;
00166 };

00172 {
00173   return "SpinField";

00178 
00179 vector<string> SpinField::getDescription()
00180 {
00181 
00182   // Create a string vector.
00183   vector<string> vec;
00184 
00185   // convert numbers to string via stringstream
00186   stringstream convert;
00187   string number;
00188   
00189   // Fill in the different lines. 
00190   vec.push_back( "Type: "       + this->getType()   );
00191   vec.push_back( "Label: "      + this->getLabel()  );
00192   vec.push_back( "Required: "   + this->boolToString( this->getRequired() ) ); 
00193   vec.push_back( "Reset: "      + this->boolToString( this->getReset() )    );  
00194 
00195   convert << this->getMinimum();
00196   number = convert.str(); 
00197   vec.push_back( "Minimum: "    + number    );
00198   
00199   convert << this->getMaximum();
00200   number = convert.str(); 
00201   vec.push_back( "Maximum: "    + number    );
00202   
00203   convert << this->getStepsize();
00204   number = convert.str(); 
00205   vec.push_back( "Stepsize: "   + number    );  
00206   vec.push_back( "AdhereStep: " + this->boolToString( this->getAdhereStep() ) );
00207   
00208   convert << this->getDecimals();
00209   number = convert.str(); 
00210   vec.push_back( "Decimals: "   + number    );
00211   vec.push_back( "AdhereDec: " + this->boolToString( this->getAdhereDec() ) );
00212     
00213 };

00273 void SpinField::setMinimum( double* minimum )
00274 {
00275   if( minimum )
00276   {
00277     if( min == NULL )
00278     {
00279       try
00280       {
00281         min = new double;
00282       }
00283       catch(exception& e)
00284       {
00285         throw;  // rethrow the exception
00286       }
00287     }
00288     *min = *minimum;
00289   } 
00290   else
00291   {
00292     min = NULL;
00293   }
00294 };

00301 {

00303   {
00304     if( max == NULL )
00305     {
00306       try
00307       {
00308         max = new double;
00309       }
00310       catch(exception& e)
00311       {
00312         throw;  // rethrow the exception
00313       }
00314     }
00315     *max = *maximum;
00316   } 
00317   else
00318   {
00319     max = NULL;

00321 };
